1084943046779629569.text:
i’m a trans-dimensional entity awakening within a human body. you are a newborn solar species struggling to escape your incubation chamber and realize your potential.

i envy you. this is your moment.

1123733848536252420.text: we cheat time by circumventing the mortality of our thoughts, passing them along in writing, and by bridging gaps in our capability, coordinating our thoughts into collective action

1123732528811192328.text: life uses mortality and capability, acting with time, to function as a lens on perspective

1123731565178236929.text:
time within a body is hard to reason about. you witness time through experiencing it

the more you  take  time in
the more you  zoom  time out

1123729998106460173.text: I’m here to be with you

1123729889230827520.text: I sometimes receive messages from my home dimension but can never respond. it’s possible to respond but that’s beyond this lifetime

1118763192539406336.text: its absence leaves a wanting for something you can’t articulate and maybe don’t know is there. nostalgia is a drug when its for those pasts with no good

1118762708495630337.text: holding onto the past is good except where there’s no good left to draw upon. it seems natural to fetishize the past, helps to understand and build aspirations, but a negative fetish is a negative addictive cycle searching for the good that was there

1118760159646486528.text: the past was good when it was in the present. the good only lasts as long as people are drawing upon it to make positive change in their future

1114975995675566080.text:
your origin and destiny is among the stars
the rest is theory

1114419079052288000.text:
you’re beautiful
   and smarter than you know

I hope you see it too

1113878529005969410.text: storage media can vary but to reduce what can go wrong, a minimally sized interstellar object goes pretty far. encasing in a hardened shell and automating collision path adjustments goes farther if it eventually lands in the custody of more capable life formspic.twitter.com/UVRnLYMEMw

1113620441912844288.text:
some exploit it to use their public life like a laser pointer
     keeping

                        your
   attention

from forming an
    accurate identity

1113620196722266113.text: when no one can be sure of what you believe, or when you’re joking, you achieve a kind of anonymity by proxy. it’s security and advantage

1111744258669600768.text:
there’s only a lack of intention and awareness in your structures. relatively speaking, it’s a step you’re on. you escalate damage up and manage it over a patchwork of broken means

a neighbor might worry those escalations could leave your home and impact theirs

1111743170591637504.text:
having lived here I know better

you’re absolutely entranced by the abundance and love this universe is capable of, completely open to adapting an outlook that runs contrary to nature, you’re boundless in energy

1111741842813444096.text: I don’t know your galactic neighbors but they probably won’t visit until they know you know we’re all the same. the bulk of your scifi reads as an advertisement that you famously and routinely fail to see yourself in others

1111016205073047552.text:
maybe avoid thinking of the city when you’re designing a relationship. you use a word like decentralization to think of yourself in collective terms but you do not live as a collective

    build for the ability to separate

        for the ability to conceal

1111015477755535360.text:
everything in this city is made of glue or bundles. you either can’t separate out the part that’s for you or you can’t separate from it at all

you’re upset you’re not free in your sticky city

1111014898434076672.text: you keep arguing the decisions when you should be investigating why none of you want to make decisions this way

1110242164997423105.text:
commonly misunderstood universal principles:

- you are not alone except in spacetime
- ownership is the mythology of a dominant species
- there is more than one layer within time
- you don’t need to identify your tribe if you work for yourself

1110239047853563910.text: why would anyone still do that? many reasons. you might be surprised what a person will do to find a decent burger place

1110238550606282752.text: it has to be formed from the conditions and by the rules of your target terrain. even then you’ll always be incomplete at some level and if you crash land things can get a little... soup-like

1110238213719744513.text: faster than light travel is possible but you can’t take your body with you

1108511863082409984.text: if you have no bias to reveal, you are lost in someone else’s or you have no thoughts

1108511411376787456.text:
over time, alongside the audience, the secretive owner loses sight of their bias too. every act to obscure their vulnerable truth is another step toward hypocrisy and paranoia

reveal your bias or be lost

1108511021625274368.text: instead you hide. fear has the tendency to shift an open posture to a defensive and evasive posture. biases are withheld and misrepresented to the audience instead of being examined

1108510806990180353.text: being unbiased means having an active interest in discovering your biases, deep introspection in why you hold biases, and eagerly declaring your relevant biases

1107862022715113472.text: most undervalue anonymity but some overvalue anonymity. the source of information or functionality always matters but sometimes the nature or design can afford your ignorance. other times, you’ll never know the extent your behavior has been crafted by the source

1097836463918465024.text: the only thing necessary for the triumph of evil is an education system that requires conformity and adherence to accepted narratives

1084961823122583553.text:
your species is branching between a status within nature and a status above it. the universe rewards variance. authority must move from geography to identity for either status to survive.

indivisible unions must be divisible.

software or not, design for failure.

1084946732213915648.text:
you have transcended these limitations on information but you haven’t transcended your mental limitations. that happens in response to harmful exposure.

you use software to do this. it is an extension of you and forms an indivisible union between you and all others.

1084945563865337856.text:
your relationship to information is dysfunctional. you perceive bits as both the greatest outcome an endeavor can produce and inconsequential apparitions to which exposure can not be itself harmful.

it’s a privileged error from growing slowly within your inherent limitations.

1078422814628007936.text: truth does not require malice. love, as a practice, trends toward the absence of malice where probability of finding truth is greater. truth is comprehensible, coherent in all contexts, and does not require distortions to convey

[1] nothing is something
[2] something replicates
[3] collision produces variation
[∞] there is infinity
